# iru_device_details (Data Source)

Get full details for a specific device.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_device_details" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
}

output "device_full_name" {
  value = data.iru_device_details.example.device_name
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.

### Read-Only

- `asset_tag` (String)
- `blueprint_id` (String)
- `device_name` (String)
- `last_check_in` (String)
- `mdm_enabled` (String)
- `model` (String)
- `os_version` (String)
- `platform` (String)
- `serial_number` (String)
- `supervised` (String)
